explanation: Sentiment on BTC is mixed but skews mildly bullish. Several users referenced bullish technical patterns (bullflag, cup & handle) and mentioned buyer control and possible upward targets (110k, 122k). Some also noted recent US regulatory news as positive. However, concerns about euphoria, volume waning, and risks of a short-term correction were also raised. There are both long and short positions discussed, but immediate 1-minute technicals (bullflag, buyers, and positive news) favor a buy signal with moderate confidence. Safe leverage is advised due to volatility and mixed crowd sentiment.
